dict.acceptation: 棉；棉线；棉织物；（其他植物所生的绒毛状的）棉状物；

sent.orig: Cotton, Egyptian Cotton Cotton, Extra Long Cotton, Cotton Yarn, Yarn EgyptianCotton Classer, Controllers Yarn.
sent.trans: 采购产品棉，埃及棉，原棉，超长棉花，棉纱，纱线。

sent.orig: Zhenzhumian, at cotton, BB cotton, Shushuang cotton, Wu Fang series product sales.
sent.trans: 珍珠棉、空棉、B棉、爽棉、纺系列产品生产销售。

sent.orig: The genetic improvement of short-season cotton is yield of cotton region of wheat-cotton double crop.
sent.trans: 短季棉品种遗传改良是实现麦棉两熟棉区粮棉双丰收的有效途径。

sent.orig: White color cotton, cotton-soft, mainly for factories spinning weaving, quilts manufacturing, cotton.
sent.trans: 棉花颜色雪白，棉体柔软，主要用于工厂纺纱织布、制造棉被、棉衣。

sent.orig: Sunflower oil, cotton seed, cotton paper, cotton, grapes, grape Red, Green Grape, Melon, sheep, sheep.
sent.trans: 葵花籽油，籽棉花，皮棉花，棉花，葡萄，红提葡萄，青提葡萄，哈密瓜，羊，绵羊。
